unit.creator: Philodemus || Avdoulou, Eleni
unit.title: Index Pythagoreorum || Fr. 41 PHerc. 1508 || Diplomatic Apparatus

dsl.content: 1 ⌈ϲ⌉ Crönert: [Ρ] ρ̣γου fort. superpos. 2 ω̣⌈ vert. ⌈ων⌉ Crönert: [Ρ] 3 ][ sin. inf. vest. et dext. vert. vel vest., sin. sup. horiz. vel arcus P: ⌈αγ⌉ Crönert 4 ⌈ιπροϲ⌉ Crönert: [Ρ] 5 ⌈ει⌉ Crönert: [Ρ] 6 ⌈του⌉ Crönert: [Ρ] 7 ⌈αγ̣αρ⌉ Crönert: [Ρ] 8 ⌈ποτε⌉ Crönert: [Ρ]
